root.name: Mallet Legend's Whac-A-Critter
root.description: OverviewMallet Legend's Whac-A-Critter (known simply as Mallet Legend in some territories) is an unlicensed whac-a-mole style game for the Sega Genesis. The game was published by RealTec in the US.Special ControllerMallet Legend ControllerThere is a special bundle of the game that came with a controller specially made for this game. The controller was a grid of buttons in a 3x3 formation. With the controller the player could hit the corresponding button to the hole which contained a mole on screen.
